page.title: 19The Locksheath Centre
page.content:
The Locksheath centre was built in 1983 and was finished in 1984. It has a large clock in the centre and has a small play ground for children. It has a good selection of hops including a large CO-OP,travel agents, hair dressing and beauty salon, chemist, estate agents, childrens clothes shop, clothes shop, butcher, bakers,cafe,chips shop,sports shop,fabric shop and a youth club. The general attitude when it was built were not good because people wree used to big space of woodland.But now most people are glad that they do not have to travel so far to do their weekly shopping.
It has a very large car park,for disabled people and bikes there is also available parking facilities. There is also a petrol station.
